channel.title: Ideal 718 server?
channel.description:
Theres lots of 718+ servers out there, meaning alot of competition, But they all seem the same to me with just diffrent home locations.
I was wondering what the community really likes?
Eg. Hard earned items, xp harder making high lvls more worth, coin having a strong value etc.
Id like all suggestions please im planning on starting a project so taking all advice.
THANK YOU.

item.title: Ideal 718 server?
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

I don’t even understand why people think that 718 servers are fun? That is the time that RuneScape was just utter sh*t. Also there isn’t even that big of a playerbase for 718 revisions. Even though I hate revisions above 474, I have to be honest and say most people enjoy 503+ better for some reason.

My advice, don’t make a 718.

Read full topic
